TopicTitle: What did you accomplish while the forums were down?

Articles.Content:
Hi everyone! I've been playing KSP since July 2012, but this is my first post on the forums.

Now that the forums are back, I thought this would be a great time to start as a member of the community.

What did you do in KSP while the forums were down? Are you preparing for 0.20? Provide some pictures!

I was quite busy!

Everything was done entirely stock.

I landed a small station on Pol (I want to having a presence around Jool for mining in 0.20).

I created a fully-functioning base on Minmus, and am ready to drill when 0.20 releases.

I put a station in orbit around Duna.

I landed a crew of 2 Kerbals on Gilly (their return is pending).

A picture of my station coming in to land on Pol. I meant to just put it in orbit around Pol, but I ended up on a collision course, so I said "Why not?"

I love this game, and am happy to now be a member of the community!

As SalmonellaDingDong has pointed out, this thread-type already exists. Thread locked.

Good idea nonetheless!
